serverInfo.name: Groq-Compound
serverInfo.title: Groq Compound
serverInfo.description: Uses Groq AI with tools like web search, code, browser, and Wolfram Alpha for real tasks.

instructions: Groq Compound systems combine powerful language models with real-world tools for active problem solving. They support Web Search, Visit Website, Code Execution, Browser Automation, and Wolfram Alpha. The groq/compound model handles multiple tool calls per request while groq/compound-mini supports one faster call. Both use advanced models like GPT-OSS 120B and Llama 4 Scout for intelligent reasoning.
